I am a self-taught front-end web developer who enjoys working on a wide variety of projects. If you have an opportunity for me to tackle a new challenge or learn a new tool, please contact me. I am always willing to consider pro bono work or collaborating with other developers, especially if it will allow me to improve my skills. Additionally, my beard is magnificent.

I love working with:

  • HTML
  • CSS / CSS5
  • Javascript
  • jQuery
  • Bootstrap
  • Canvas
  • AJAX
  • SCSS

I'm excited to learn more about:

  • React
  • Meteor.js
  • Angular / Angular2
  • Three.js
  • TDD with Jasmine/Karma
  • Node.js
